page.title: 12TOURISM
page.content:
The Golf Inn is owned by Mr and Mrs Saddler and was built in 1836. Licensing hours are Sunday to Thursday 11am to 11pm ,Friday and Saturday 11am to 1am. The best selling drink is 70 Shilling Heavy (beer) and costs 78p per pint, eating at the Inn ranges from bar lunches to an a la carte dinner menu. There are three bars one of which is in the skittle alley. An evening at the skittle alley is very popular with people from offices in Edinburgh .
Other hotels in this area are : The Queens Hotel,Gullane The Mallard Hotel,Gullane The Bissets Hotel,Gullane The Castle Inn, Dirleton.
